akn:section.akn:heading: Applicability to receivers, trustees, successors, and assigns

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 50502. Applicability to receivers, trustees, successors, and assigns This subtitle applies to receivers, trustees, successors, and assigns of any person to whom this subtitle applies. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 8(b), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1567.)
